channel.title: RSC F2p Opening
channel.description:
So... Jagex have been doing pretty good updates this past month... However if they really want to create world peace they will need to open up a RSC F2p world. Who thinks they will do it? and when?
Debate and Discuss.

item.title: RSC F2p Opening
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

[quote=“Intoxication, post:36, topic:381964”][quote author=RLN link=topic=477770.msg3502916#msg3502916 date=1297893893]

It’s so sad watching you kids cling to the thought that it could open up again. I feel sorry for everyone who clicked “yes”.
[/quote]It’s so sad watching you kids be so hypocritical. You show up to the runescape classic boards… just to flame others that are talking/hoping/developing for it? Get a life dude

If only I was being hypocritical, then yes that would be sad. Unfortunately you don’t know know what hypocritical means else you wouldn’t have tried to apply it here. Get an education dude.

@IlikeArrays: Hey lets pretend I didn’t put the correct source up. Maybe that will stop people from crashing your server. Yeah, lets do that.[/quote]
That’s called being a hypocrite you dumbfuck.

Go finish middle school.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC F2p Opening
item.dc:creator: @SVU SVU
item.description:
@SVU wrote:

[quote=“OldSkoolRSC, post:28, topic:381964”][quote author=SVU link=topic=477770.msg3497153#msg3497153 date=1297422472]
Pomp didn’t layout shit for anybody. I did every last bit of that landscape myself, but nice try there. I put whatever the fuck I wanted where ever the fuck I wanted.
[/quote]
This is where you stop talking about landscape

And yeah, like I said before, you’re the only retard who bitches on every single forum. And like I said before, no1 has complained but you. So I think it’s good.

This is where you start talking about me complaining in general on every forum.

[quote author=SVU link=topic=477770.msg3498392#msg3498392 date=1297533694]
You said “PEOPLE COMPLAINED ABOUT PKING” when I said “You’re the only person complaining about the landscape”. [/quote]
This is where you confuse yourself. You never said “You’re the only person complaining about the landscape”. Maybe in ur retarded mind you were thinking it, but you never articulated it.

Since landscape isnt the subject anymore when you say im the only one who complains on every single forum, i brought up one issue that affected aftermath specifically, which was the lack of pking, which EVERYONE complained about.

Do i have to break everything down for you so you can follow a simple conversation…honestly?

Pomp…ur the last person to talk shit bro…aftermath started out as a pking server with a good fucking plan, then turned into something completely different…what the fuck happened there…[/quote]
Yeah, lets just completely leave out the part where I said “And like I said before, no1 has complained but you. So I think it’s good.”

Read full topic

item.title: RSC F2p Opening
item.dc:creator: @DMXXXX DMXXXX
item.description:
@DMXXXX wrote:

[quote=“elyad, post:20, topic:381964”]It’s a no brainer. If RSC Just Re-Released RSC. Enabled players to create accounts, F2P & P2P Servers, The cash flow would roll in for them. The game runs itself, There’s no need for updates. Just basic moderating of botters. It makes no sense why you would just completely disregard a game that made your company what it is today. And without the Loyal players of RSC then Jagex would not exist.

Even on the 2 week Trial, They added extra servers, And each server was full with over 1k Players in each. It just shows how much potential profit there would be in RSC for them.

Weather they do this or not is a different matter, And this case will be continued to be argued for years to come. Ah well.

Has anybody ever thought of putting a petition together, For the Re-Release of RSC & Enabling people to re-create accounts? If enough people could get involved, And we continued to persuade them, Then maybe it could happen?[/quote]

I’m pretty that a petition has been attempted in the past and if I remember correctly, it was signed by a decent amount of people. Though that was AWHILE back and since Jagex seems to be STARTING to actually pay attention to the players, I don’t see why another try won’t hurt. Honestly there’s nothing to lose, if they don’t…they don’t, if they do then all the hard work has paid off.

Read full topic

Pomp didn’t layout shit for anybody. I did every last bit of that landscape myself, but nice try there. I put whatever the fuck I wanted where ever the fuck I wanted.
[/quote]
well we both know thats not true, thats what counts.

And yeah, like I said before, you’re the only retard who bitches on every single forum. And like I said before, no1 has complained but you. So I think it’s good.

Ok so no one on aftermath complained there was no pking? not one single player ever said, “wheres the pking?”, no your right. You should tottaly flame the one guy who doesnt complain ingame to random players and logs out, but actually wants to improve things for the better and goes to the forums for direct communication to the developers/staff with suggestions, for change. After this happens on a regular basis, maybe i start to care less about peoples feelings and shape some of my opinions to deliver the most effect that would provoke attention and hopefully change. Where does a bunch of ‘yes’ men get you dan?

Back on topic, yes IF f2p AND p2p worlds were brought back for runescape, id agree with you as its only logical. An uncalled for attack against me, without p2p worlds being in any part of the original question/debate on the other hand, isnt.[/quote]
Ask Pomp, he’ll tell you. Ask anyone who admin’d on Aftermath, they’ll tell you.
I was talking about the the landscape, not about PKing. But yeah I guess you can go off topic

Read full topic

item.title: RSC F2p Opening
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“uberpk3r, post:19, topic:381964”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=477770.msg3497246#msg3497246 date=1297438148]

So… Jagex have been doing pretty good updates this past month… However if they really want to create world peace they will need to open up a RSC F2p world. Who thinks they will do it? and when?

Debate and Discuss.

Please just STFU with these RSC debates !

JaGaX opened RSC for a week/days for people to start playing the shit . Tons of people payed to player the a week but yet no one continued. there is now less then 20 people playing RSC on the RuneScape.com site.

FTF/ Face the Facts. RSC is a dead game(Very soon, perhaps a year its more dead then now!) RuneSCape 2 is the new RSC KBAIAND Thanks for listen to KFG Mario¨s snoopy¨s radio station!

Again, only reason rsc failed was because it was P2P. Also Runescape 2 will never be the new RSC… Runescape 2 willl never come close to touching RSC.
[/quote]

I see you saying that yet its sounds *** in my ears, RS2 is an upgrade on RSC.
A game Grows It doesn’t want to stay in the age where wheels where square.
The graphic upgrades the game becomes different but the base is always the same.

RSC failed because its outdated, people prefer better graphic these days.
Keep debating RSC we all know its over sooner or later and you can’t do anything about it.

Except RSCEmulation.net it still has good amount of players.[/quote]

Yes RS2 is based off RSC, I can agree with you there. However the brains behind the whole project was in Andrews mind and when he decided to let other people in on behind the game content… it really just wasn’t the same. Yes he had the final word if it was implemented or not but again, you just can’t develop a game then let other people take it over without some kind of consequence. Even the people he hired have never played runescape in their life yet one of them is the CEO (which is finally making good choices and putting things how they should be). Mark was rusty at the start, now I believe he gets the idea of what players want. He showed interest in RSC and that is why RSC was opened up. So there is always the possibility that it will be reopened again.

@Elyad, Petitions have very little affect (from past trials). However as you stated the game runs itself which will follow my next few statements.

I was recently at the airport and the only guy next to me was this Asian who was on his laptop. We got into a conversation as he was headed to China and I to my destination. We talked about what games he plays on his computer and we only had one game in common… starcraft. Starcraft has been around since 1998 and yet still thrives to this day. The graphics are not the best (to me they are fucking sexy). I asked the guy for his name online and he said he doesn’t play online. I was shocked. I asked what do you do then? He explained he can’t get online because he only has starcraft beta because it was free. RSC was free and yet ran on 100mb of memory so the shittiest computers could hold it. Yet I was still amazed that I found a group of people who have never played runescape, WoW, or any online mmorpg.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC F2p Opening
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

It’s a no brainer. If RSC Just Re-Released RSC. Enabled players to create accounts, F2P & P2P Servers, The cash flow would roll in for them. The game runs itself, There’s no need for updates. Just basic moderating of botters. It makes no sense why you would just completely disregard a game that made your company what it is today. And without the Loyal players of RSC then Jagex would not exist.

Even on the 2 week Trial, They added extra servers, And each server was full with over 1k Players in each. It just shows how much potential profit there would be in RSC for them.

Weather they do this or not is a different matter, And this case will be continued to be argued for years to come. Ah well.

Has anybody ever thought of putting a petition together, For the Re-Release of RSC & Enabling people to re-create accounts? If enough people could get involved, And we continued to persuade them, Then maybe it could happen?

Read full topic

item.title: RSC F2p Opening
item.dc:creator: @SVU SVU

That wasn’t mine.
[/quote]
already cleared up

Yeah, re-doing the whole landscape of a game and getting nothing but compliments on it, man i’m horrific.

Whole landscape? pretty sure pomp designed the general layout coz he didnt want you to fuck it up with random shit everywhere. Besides, opinions from rs2 fanboys dont weigh very much.

And you’re really that dumb to think they wont leave 2 P2P worlds up? Dam you so smart.

Are you really that dumb to attack my response, trying to put me down, when it was replying directly to the question, and not to any ‘p2p worlds’ that was NEVER in the question in the first place and only mentioned in ur post after mine was made?

And good disss bro. What can you even do? Oh yeah, just bitch on forums

burn sick burn. If i ‘bitch’, its coz i just want to play on a well thought out pking server and loathe shitty fail attempts trying to pass them selves off as such.

I cant code a server, but any moron can landscape badly, your a good example of that. If i should bother to try landscaping for a couple seconds and become as ‘proficient’ as you, maybe i would i have the arrogance and superiority you possess.

GTFO with ur useless flame and spam, it was never provoked.[/quote]
Pomp didn’t layout shit for anybody. I did every last bit of that landscape myself, but nice try there. I put whatever the fuck I wanted where ever the fuck I wanted. And yeah, like I said before, you’re the only retard who bitches on every single forum. And like I said before, no1 has complained but you. So I think it’s good.
